issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Allow ReduceSinkDeDuplication to kick in when there are constant keys

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently, it seems that we look to match the ColumnInfo between the parent and the child rowschemas by calling rci = rs.getColumnInfo(tblAlias, alias) which might be a bit aggressive. i.e. we will lose opportunity to constant propogate even if the columns are the same but the alias in the rowschemas do not match. We need to introduce additional checks to see if the columns can be mapped to constants from parents.
fields.summary: ConstantPropagateProcCtx.resolve() should verify internal names in addition to alias to match 2 columns from different row schemas

ATTACHMENT ID: 12780372 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

* We are able to replace key columns in RS with constants (where applicable) which is good.
* However, we were earlier able to prune constants from value columns, which we are seeming to loose now.
* Can you check changes of {{dynpart_sort_optimization2.q}} Here it seems we are losing one MR job, which may be opposite to what test case might be wanting to do. Because it might specifically trying to insert a job.
Updated golden files and addressed Ashutosh's comments.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12780858 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
The issue with reducesink_dedup is ordering issue. The rest of the failures are unrelated to the fix.

[~hsubramaniyan], this is marked as Fix Version/s 2.0.0 but the commit went to master, which will be 2.1.0.  I don't see any commit to branch-2.0 for 2.0.0.

See commit 630d3e26d7889b7931b2f3ef70d30449fd7ca256.
Hi [~leftylev] There are a few merge conflicts on 2.0, I will commit them soon.
HIVE-12866 is the follow up jira to lift constant key related restriction in ReduceSinkDeduplication optimization.
